name: cloud-commander
description: CloudCMD is a file manager for browsers with a built-in text editor and terminal, providing easy access to local or remote files via SSH. Itâ€™s self-hostable and great for managing servers and development environments.
features: Browser File Manager: Manage files through web browser. No desktop needed.
Built-in Editor: Text editor for code and configuration files. Edit anywhere.
Terminal Access: Integrated terminal for command execution. Complete control.
SSH Support: Access remote files via SSH. Secure connections.
Server Management: Perfect for managing servers and development environments. Admin tool.
Self-Hosted: Run your own file manager. Complete privacy.
Developer-Friendly: Built for developers and sysadmins. Power user features.
